Posts.Content:
Well, The doctor removed alot of beast tissue yesterday from my chest. He said there was more there then they thought. So, now I am home doring okay. On the other hand my dad has full blown lung cancer. Not much left to them. 
Thanks and love to all,
Posts.Title: Found a large lump

Posts.Content: Good for you. Hope all go's well. I have had pain in my breast and was tool that it is breast tissue. Now, they will be removing it on July 20th. I have had the pain for a year now. Best to you.

Posts.Content:
Sorr, that it has taken tolong to write back. All went good having my cysts removed. They were larger then they thought but B9.
Thanks to all
Posts.Title: Found a large lump

Posts.Content: Hi,everyone. I am Frank, 50 years of age in live in Norfolk, Va, husband for 30 yrs and father of 3. 2 boys and a boy want to be, all in their twenties. Plus 3 grandboys. Most time you can find me in the lupus area but, now I have a lump in my left beast. So, now I have to have a mammogram and a ultrasound which, is set up for next week. Thanks to you all
